description:
Hasegawa Chisato is known around Hijirigasaka Academy`s "all too beautiful" school nurse and a former high-ranking god amongst the Ten Gods of the Divine Realm. Chisato is also the younger cousin of Raphaeline, making her the cousin-once-removed of Basara Toujou.
At first, she acted as a mentor for Basara for the several issues in his life when he`s protecting Mio Naruse and the others from various threats unbeknownst to him, but she later develops genuine romantic feelings for him, leading the two of them into a secret romantic relationship for the majority of the series.
Source: Shinmai Maou no Keiyakusha Wiki
name: Hasegawa Chisato
